headerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Photovoltaic system. Devices are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set the accessory name to be displayed in HomeKit.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the envoy ip address/hostname or leave empty, will use default path envoy.local.

envoyFirmware7xx.title: Firmware 7.x.x
envoyFirmware7xx.description: This enable support for Envoy with firmware 7.x.x and newer.

envoyFirmware7xxTokenGenerationMode.title: Token Generation Mode
envoyFirmware7xxTokenGenerationMode.description: Here select how You wuld to obtain the Token.

envoyPasswd.title: Envoy Password
envoyPasswd.description: Here set the envoy password, only if You already changed the default password.

envoySerialNumber.title: Envoy Serial Number
envoySerialNumber.description: Here set the envoy serial number.

enlightenUser.title: Enlighten User
enlightenUser.description: Here set the enlighten user name.

powerProductionSummary.title: Power Summary
powerProductionSummary.description: Here set the power summary in (W) of all microinverters, based on this value the power production level will be calculated and displayed as (%) in HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Select the sensor type to be displayed in HomeKit.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: This enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for the sensor name.

name.description: Here set Your own sensor name.

powerLevel.description: Here set power level in (W) at which the sensor fired.

supportProductionPowerMode.title: Power Production
supportProductionPowerMode.description: This enable support to check/control power production, firmware 7.x.x and newer require installer credentials data.

supportPlcLevel.title: PLC Level
supportPlcLevel.description: This enable support to check plc level, firmware 7.x.x and newer require installer credentials data.

supportEnchargeProfile.title: Profile
supportEnchargeProfile.description: This enable support for encharge profile, not working yet.

metersDataRefreshTime.title: Meters Refresh Time
metersDataRefreshTime.description: Here set meters data refresh time in (sec).

productionDataRefreshTime.title: Production Refresh Time
productionDataRefreshTime.description: Here set production data rfresh time in (sec).

liveDataRefreshTime.title: Live Data Refresh Time
liveDataRefreshTime.description: Here set live data refresh time in (sec).

ensembleDataRefreshTime.title: Ensemble Refresh Time
ensembleDataRefreshTime.description: Here set ensemble data refresh time in (sec).

disableLogInfo.title: Disable Log Info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable log info, all values and state will not be displayed in Homebridge log console.

disableLogDeviceInfo.title: Disable Log Device Info
disableLogDeviceInfo.description: This disable log device info by every connections device to the network.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: This enable debug mode for RESTFul.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the listening Port for RESTful server.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: This enable debug mode for MQTT.

host.title: IP/Hostname
host.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

port.title: Port
port.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

auth.title: Authorization
auth.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

user.title: User
user.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

passwd.title: Password
passwd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.

items.title: Envoy
Credentials Data
items.description: In this section You can set envoy and enphase credentils data.
Here You can configure envoy gateway.
